local_clues.quote: shift your weight to the ball of your feet and bend your knees get as close to 90 degrees as you can
local_clues.clue: The person is instructed to shift weight to the ball of their feet and bend their knees to 90 degrees, indicating the correct form being described.

local_clues.quote: looking straight ahead and from here push back up to the starting position
local_clues.clue: The person is instructed to look straight ahead and push back up to the starting position, emphasizing correct posture and the full motion of the squat.

local_clues.quote: this is going to be great for strengthening your thighs or your quadriceps as well as your butt or your glutes
local_clues.clue: Explains the benefits of performing the squat correctly, reinforcing the importance of proper form.

local_clues.quote: it's also going to be great to work on your posture that's how to properly perform a squat
local_clues.clue: Reiterates the importance of proper posture throughout the squat movement.

global_clues.quote: let's learn how to properly perform a squat
global_clues.clue: Introduction to the video's purpose of teaching proper squat technique.
global_clues.relevance_to_segment: Sets the context for the entire video, indicating that the focus will be on proper squat form, relevant to the segment's instructions.

logical_inferences.details: The segment primarily demonstrates how to correctly perform a squat, highlighting key points such as shifting weight to the ball of the feet, bending knees to 90 degrees, maintaining posture, and engaging muscles.

logical_inferences.description: Emphasis on Posture and Muscle Engagement
logical_inferences.details: The instructions throughout the segment focus on maintaining proper posture and aiming for 90 degrees knee bend, with an emphasis on strengthening thighs, glutes, and overall posture.
